name: .HOP
summary: Learn about .HOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: HOP files are not meant to be opened by players. However, modders who want to examine or extract the assets a HOP file contains can do so using Industrial Park (Windows), a fan-made HOP and HIP archive utility. Modders can also use Watto Studios Game Extractor or QuickBMS (Windows) to extract the assets a HOP file contains.
